itunes:title: Advanced Screening: New Books for Your Summer Reading!
title: Advanced Screening: New Books for Your Summer Reading!
description:
In Episode 52 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share upcoming releases . They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about motherhood trends in fiction

**If you enjoy our podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, & Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, plus fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our BRAND NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons & we just introduced reading partiesðŸŽ‰- all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
2:57 Vacay All Day Face Set
7:20 Topo Chico Hard Seltzer

Latest Reads
10:45 I Must Betray You| Ruta Sepetys (R) ðŸŽ§
16:26 Fountains of Silence | Ruta Sepetys
16:43 The Murder Rule | Dervla McTiernan Â  (T) ðŸŽ§

Shelf Additions

1:01:58 Novel Suspects

Connect with us on social media! On Instagram, Tina @Tbretc, Renee Â @Itsbooktalk, and the podcast is @booktalketc

Love audiobooks? Head to Libro.fm & find your next must listen audiobook! *link is an affiliate which we earn a small commission at no cost to you

You can also email us at booktalketc@gmail.com
